channel.title: Pink Cell Phones on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Pink Cell Phones on 0x000216

item.title: It's Pink Cell Phone Season Again
item.description: Valentine’s Day kicks off the season for pink cell phones, a trend that lasts until Mother’s Day. This convergence of technology and pink offers a stylish option for yourself or your significant other. This year, the Samsung Instinct Pink for Sprint PCS is a top pick. Though usually a pricey phone, it’s available at a significant discount with an Everything Plan or Talk/Message/Data Share Plan from Sprint PCS. Families can even get two discounted phones with the right family plan.

item.title: Pink Android Intercept Means Business
item.description: The Samsung Intercept, with its stylish satin pink exterior, could easily be described as “Pretty in Pink,” much like the classic 80s movie. This phone is more than just attractive; it’s also a highly capable device. This pink Android phone boasts a large 3-inch touchscreen display, providing access to a vast library of apps from the Android Market. What sets it apart from other touchscreen phones is its full slide-out QWERTY keyboard, enabling swift emailing, instant messaging, and texting.
